name: acro-bike
effect: Increases movement speed outside or in caves. Slower than the mach bike. Can perform various tricks, allowing the trainer to reach certain special areas.
short_effect: More maneuverable than the Mach Bike, and allows hopping along rails.

flavor_text.emerald: A folding bicycle capable of jumps and wheelies.
flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: A folding bicycle capable of jumps and wheelies.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: A folding bicycle that is capable of stunts like jumps and wheelies.
